Prev: Snail Up: Fundació Joan Miró Next: Mercury fountain, II

Mercury fountain



This fountain was created by Calder as a tribute to the mercury miners of Almaden. The liquid flowing through it is mercury, not water.
Taken Thursday, September 13, 2001, 03:47:17pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 1.1Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/30s @ F4.5, ISO 100, 57mm
